Badly damaged, the Vindicator plunges through the atmosphere, leaving 
a trail of fire plainly visible to everyone on that side of the 
planet.  (Which is basically everyone in the RPG.)

The artificial meteor falls in the mountains, its drive core exploding 
in a hellacious blast.  Vindicator is down - forever!

OOC: Are the Forgotten Autobots really finished?  Anyone who wants can 
bring back one or more of them: Trailbreaker, Pipes, Bluestreak, 
Hound, Warpath, Outback, and Powerglide.  Just email me if you're 
interested, and I can describe them to you.
